text: Pyotr Nikolayevich Mamonov (, ; 14 April 1951 â€“ 15 July 2021) was a Russian rock musician and songwriter. He was known for being the frontman of the Moscow band Zvuki Mu. Mamonov was born in Moscow. Mamonov died on 15 July 2021 in Moscow from COVID-19, aged 70. ==References== Category:1951 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Russian musicians Category:Writers from Moscow Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Moscow
title: Pyotr Mamonov
